channel.title: [PI] noone can login =(
channel.description:
hello,
last i mada a webclient for my pi server adn tested it (worked). but now when friends try to log in it says cannot connect to server =/ and yes ive changed ip to my hamachi (because i cant port forward on my router =() erm also the server window says nothing but when i start server it says: on port [b]0.0.0.0[/b]:43594 maybe i need to run it on a different ip?
i would apriciate help,
sarranoob

item.title: [PI] noone can login =(
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“sarranoob, post:3, topic:383397”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=479176.msg3508102#msg3508102 date=1298307171]
yes, you solved it yourself. run it on your no-ip ip. and also, have you checked if your port is open? go to www.canyouseeme.org and check if port 43594 is open, if not, then no one can log in
[/quote]
well the problem is: for no-ip i need to port forward (i think). and i cant do that.
secondly i have no damn clue how to make it (if necessery) run on a different ip (if i knew that i wud have tested it).

thanks for the port site i gunna check that now…[/quote]
Well you dont “need” to portforward, but you can use a tool called utorrent to port forward. and you change the ip in a file named server.java just search for 0.0.0.0

Read full topic
